summary: REQ-7 appears partially implemented in Layout.tsx (header set to bg-transparent and sticky + scroll-compress retained). REQ-6 (replacing the generated icon PNG asset with a newly extracted transparent icon) is not evidenced in the provided diff summary. Several additional non-requested changes (theme/CSS variables and project metadata/summaries) are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Extract the floral logo icon from 1770214375269~2.png, remove its background to full transparency, and replace the existing generated icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/aurelie-icon-transparent.dim_512x512.png so header/footer use it everywhere without changing references.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows Layout.tsx referencing the existing icon path, but there is no evidence that the PNG asset itself was replaced/updated (binary asset changes are not shown; no file entry for the PNG in the modified files list).
evidence: Modified files list does not include frontend/public/assets/generated/aurelie-icon-transparent.dim_512x512.png

hallucinated_features.description: Large update/addition of theme/color CSS variable definitions and branding-related comments in global CSS.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-6 or REQ-7, which focus on replacing an icon asset and making the header transparent/removing brand-area background styling.
